data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3525542,"name":"","username":"BobKan396","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/df705f/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-13T01:19:31.225Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe are currently having issues with our corral intake mech when it’s supposed to outtake the corral. It just stalls and doesn’t come out. We’ve tested the exact some motor on the exact same mechanism with the same power with pwm and it works fine with minimal effort and speed. We have checked the motor and it is getting 12V, but no matter what we try with software, whether it be duty cycle, voltage control, it doesn’t spit out the corral smoothly like pwm did.
